short_summary: One (1) Senior Business Consultant for DND, with 1+2 option periods, 3.75M tier 1, Solicitation # W8476-246878/A, Proposed Procurement description CALL issued by Treasury Board.
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT File Number: W8476-246878/A Tier: 1 (< $3.75M) This requirement is for the Department of National Defence (DND) for the services of ONE (1) Senior Business Consultant. The intent of this solicitation is to establish one (1) contract for one (1) initial year, with the option to extend the term of the contract by up to two (2) one-year irrevocable option periods under the same conditions. This solicitation is open to the list of pre-qualified suppliers under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Service (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) # EN578-170432 for tier 1 of 3.75M. The proposed procurement is created by Treasury Board.
full_summary:
===============

**Notice of Request for Proposal**

**Solicitation Number:** W8476-246878/A

**Publication Date:** 2024-04-08

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-23T14:00:00

**Amendment Number:** 2

**Purpose:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking the services of a Senior Business Consultant under Stream 4, Business Services. This requirement is for the provision of expert advice and support to facilitate the successful delivery of business initiatives and services.

**Scope of Work:**
The selected consultant will work closely with DND stakeholders to identify and assess business needs, develop and implement solutions, and evaluate the effectiveness of services. The consultant will also be responsible for providing guidance and support to DND employees on business-related matters.

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers:**
This solicitation is open to the following pre-qualified suppliers who have demonstrated the necessary expertise and experience in business consulting services:

[List of Pre-Qualified Suppliers]

**Security Requirements:**
The Solicitor reserves the right to conduct security screening on the selected consultant. A security clearance at the Secret level is required.

**Location of Work:**
The work will be performed in the National Capital Region, specifically at one of the following locations:

* 975 Boulevard Saint-Joseph, Gatineau, Québec
* 105 Rue de l'Hôtel-de-Ville, Gatineau, Québec

**Tender Documents:**
The tender documents will be e-mailed directly to the pre-qualified suppliers. Bidders are advised that the tender documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS).

**Submission:**
Bidders must submit their proposals in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Point of Contact:**
For inquiries, please contact Kelsey Lawrence at kelsey.lawrence2@forces.gc.ca.

**Submissions:**
Submissions must be received by the closing date and time. Late submissions will not be accepted.

**Selection Criteria:**
The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Expertise and experience in business consulting services
* Ability to meet the security requirements
* Capacity to work collaboratively with DND stakeholders
* Proposal content and overall presentation

**Note:**
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. [End of Text]
